channel.title: Webclient help PI
channel.description:
cant find any tut about it :mad:
can someone teach me how on msn...or make one for me and explain it
we can talk on msn about the rewards Mitchvandenakker2@hotmail.com

item.title: Webclient help PI
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

[quote=“P A N I C, post:7, topic:388630”][quote author=Barrick link=topic=484449.msg3549820#msg3549820 date=1301435084]
I used ric940’s I think that’s his name for my [PI] Server. Go on google > Ric’s PI webclient tutorial
[/quote]
Pretty much what he said
Ric is the best for webclient’s tbh.[/quote]

as i told i dont have a class44 or a method67 in mt client.java what is needed for ric’s guide…

Read full topic

if(l2 < 0) { s2 = (new StringBuilder()).append(“Length error: “).append(i2).append(”/”).append(l1).toString(); throw new IOException(“EOF”); } i2 += l2; int i3 = (i2 * 100) / l1; if(i3 != j1) { method13(k, (byte)4, (new StringBuilder()).append(“Loading “).append(s).append(” - “).append(i3).append(”%”).toString());
